presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.text: Everyday Better is a mobile and web app designed to help you build good habits and grow every day. It is intended for anyone who wants to improve their daily life â€” personally, professionally, physically or mentally.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Encourage users to adopt positive routines in a simple, gradual and motivating way.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: Provide a smart and accessible tool so everyone can become a better version of themselves.

howItWorks.title: How does Everyday Better work?
howItWorks.text: You define your own habits, track your progress, receive reminders, and view your efforts on a clear dashboard. The app supports you without judgment, at your own pace.
